name: TomcatDeployment
description: Deploy application to a tomcat server.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: TomcatUrl
inputs.label: Tomcat Server URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the Tomcat server url which should contain the procotol, host and port details. Example- http://test.azure.cloudapp.net:8080

inputs.name: Username
inputs.label: Tomcat Manager Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the user name to connect to the Tomcat manager. Tomcat manager should be running on the server.

inputs.name: Password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify the password to connect to the Tomcat manager.
It can accept variable defined in Build/Release definitions as '$(passwordVariable)'.
You may mark variable type as 'secret' to secure it.

inputs.name: Warfile
inputs.label: WAR File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Absolute path of the war file present on the agent machine, or a UNC Share. Example- C:\Agent\Binaries\Demo.war Or $(warFilePath).

inputs.name: Context
inputs.label: Application Context
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the application context path. Example- /Production

instanceNameFormat: Deploy application to a tomcat server
